page.title: 02TRANSPORT IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THERE ARE 2 PUBLIC BUS OPERATORS IN STOCKSBRIDGE. THEY ARE, SOUTH Y0RKSHIRE TRANSPORT FROM SHEFFIELD AND YORKSHIRE TRACTION FROM BARNSLEY. THERE ARE 6 BUSES WHICH RUN IN THE AREA. THEY ARE THE X66, X67, 57, 58, 381 AND 384. THE X 66 STARTS AT THE SPORTS CENTRE, GOES ROUND GARDEN VILLAGE, UP WHITWELL THROUGH THE STUBBIN AND OUT TO SHEFFIELD. THE X67 STARTS AT THE STEELWORKS, TRAVELS UP TO BOLSTERSTONE, THROUGH DEEPCAR AND AGAIN OUT TO SHEFFIELD. THE 57 STARTS AT UNSLIVEN BRIDGE, COMES ALONG MANCHESTER ROAD TO SHEFFIELD. IT COSTS 20P FOR ADULTS AND 4P FOR CHILDREN. THE X48 OPERATES TWICE DAILY FROM SHEFFIELD TO MANCHESTER PASSING THROUGH STOCKSBRIDGE.
